H0.text: Which English town was awarded city status in March this year. Southend-on-Sea

H1.text: Which English town was awarded city status in March this year. Milton Keynes

H2.text: Which English town was awarded city status in March this year. Plymouth

H3.text: Which English town was awarded city status in March this year. CHELMSFORD

A4.text: The announcement to make Chelmsford a city had been made on 14 March 2012 by the Lord President of the Privy Council and Deputy Prime Minister, Nick Clegg.
